constituent: wipe, finger, fingers, style, arrow, craft
koohiiStory1: Why carry a handkerchief? I wipe my nose finger-style.
koohiiStory2: If you are going to wipe your nose with your fingers, better do it in a grand style.
myStory: lau sạch. ngón tay phong cách.
readingExamples: 拭う (ぬぐ.う), 拭く (ふ.く)
